mapper.sql: id, name, area, status, start_date, end_date
mapper.insert: insert into im_project (id, name, area, status, start_date, end_date, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update im_project
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
